metadata.title: CVE-2023-39975 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: kdc/do_tgs_req.c in MIT Kerberos 5 (aka krb5) 1.21 before 1.21.2 has adouble free that is reachable if an authenticated user can trigger anauthorization-data handling failure. Incorrect data is copied from oneticket to another.

criterions.comment: krb5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
